properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The heavens declare Thy glory Lord In every star Thy wisdom shines But when our eyes behold Thy Word We read Thy name in fairer lines{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The rolling sun the changing light And night and days Thy pow'r confess But the blest volume Thou did'st write Reveals Thy justice and Thy grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sun moon and stars convey Thy praise Round the whole earth and never stand So when Thy truth began its race It touched and glanced on ev'ry land{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nor shall Thy spreading gospel rest Till through the world Thy truth has run Till Christ has all the nations blest That see the light or feel the sun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Great Sun of righteousness arise Bless the dark world with heav'nly light Thy gospel makes the simple wise Thy laws are pure Thy judgements right{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy noblest wonders here we view In souls renewed and sins forgiven Lord cleanse my sins my soul renew And make Thy Word my guide to heav'n{/lang-eng}
